title: Unity
creator_credit: Stephen Cross, Paul Keeler and Stephen Cross Ltd
brief_description: Introduces some of the ideas upon which Islamic civilization rests and serves also to ‘place’ the civilization historically and geographically. Explains the symbolic meaning of Mecca, its furnishings, and the traditional pilgrimage. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
